author: Jaid <jaid.jsx@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Jaid)

scripts.babel:prod: rimraf dist/transpiled/production && NODE_ENV=production babel --out-dir dist/transpiled/production --source-maps true src
scripts.babel:dev: rimraf dist/transpiled/development && NODE_ENV=development babel --out-dir dist/transpiled/development src
scripts.babel:test: rimraf dist/transpiled/test && NODE_ENV=test babel --out-dir dist/transpiled/test src
scripts.test: npm run build:prod && NODE_ENV=production MAIN=$(npx find-by-extension-cli js --fullPath --cwd dist/package/production) jest --runInBand --passWithNoTests
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=development node dist/package/development/cli.js
scripts.test:dev: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=test MAIN=dist/package/development/cli.js jest
scripts.debug: npm run build:dev && DEBUG="$npm_package_name,$npm_package_name:*" NODE_ENV=test MAIN=dist/package/development/cli.js jest --colors --runInBand --detectOpenHandles

name: open-project-cli
description: Very opinionated CLI tool that opens project folders in VSCode.
